description: Simplistic watch face is just as the name suggests, a simple and minimalistic watch face for when you feel like going with a classic analog type watch face which shows just the required information with a little modern touch to it!Features :- - Change watch face color to blue, yellow, orange, red & purple - Shows watch battery percentage on the left  - Easy to read day and date of the day on the right - Change watch face color from the handheld - More like interactive and option to choose for many other types of information coming soon! Simplistic watch face :)
descriptionHTML:
Simplistic watch face is just as the name suggests, a simple and minimalistic watch face for when you feel like going with a classic analog type watch face which shows just the required information with a little modern touch to it!

Features :-
- Change watch face color to blue, yellow, orange, red & purple
- Shows watch battery percentage on the left
- Easy to read day and date of the day on the right
- Change watch face color from the handheld
- More like interactive and option to choose for many other types of information coming soon!

Simplistic watch face :)
comments: This watch face is beautiful but please allow the option of a colored ambient mode with just the second hand disabled to save battery.   This works well for other faces I've used without a significant by drain on the battery.
This is my favorite watchface. Simple and beautiful
